name: Live To Live
description:
This game is called Live To Live AKA Don’t Leave The Screen To Win AKA If You See Yourself Then You May Stay

(Change skin available)

Whatever…This is a mini game which allow you to control a pentagon and you HAVE to stay in the screen, or you will die.

There will be obstacles try to push you out, but you can also use explosion to blow them out.

Dashing are also available, you may use it to speed up to made a  dodge or push the obstacles on ground.

Control:

Pay whatever you want, feel free to play this game and have fun, though it was my first project done, it may be buggy, please report in the comment, I will try to fix it.
